emails.subject: NLP sentiment dataset - 500k locations, daily updates
emails.preview: Alternative data feed for quant models
emails.body_text:
Hi {{first_name}},

As a quant at {{company_name}}, you're probably always looking for uncorrelated signals.

We've built a consumer sentiment dataset that might interest you:

• 500k+ retail/restaurant/hotel locations tracked
• Daily sentiment scores from Google Maps, Yelp, TripAdvisor
• NLP-processed with location-level granularity
• Historical data back to 2023

The data shows 0.4+ correlation with next-quarter same-store sales for consumer discretionary names.

We offer:
- Raw data feed (JSON/CSV/API)
- Pre-computed sentiment indices by sector
- Anomaly detection signals

Would you be interested in seeing sample data and our methodology docs?

Simon
ReviewSignal.ai

---
To unsubscribe, reply with 'UNSUBSCRIBE' or click: {{unsubscribe_link}}
ReviewSignal.ai | Schillerstrasse 5, 10625 Berlin, Germany

emails.subject: Re: Sentiment dataset - technical specs
emails.body_text:
{{first_name}},

Following up with some technical details on our dataset:

DATA SCHEMA:
- location_id: unique identifier
- brand: company name (e.g., "McDonald's")
- ticker: stock symbol (e.g., "MCD")
- latitude/longitude: geo coordinates
- sentiment_score: -1.0 to 1.0 (NLP-derived)
- rating_avg: current Google rating
- review_count: total reviews
- review_velocity: reviews per day
- anomaly_flag: boolean
- timestamp: UTC datetime

UPDATE FREQUENCY: Daily (2 AM UTC)
FORMATS: JSON, CSV, Parquet
API: REST with Python SDK

Historical backfill available for backtesting.

Want me to send over sample data files and API docs?

Simon

---
To unsubscribe, reply with 'UNSUBSCRIBE' or click: {{unsubscribe_link}}

emails.subject: Backtest results you might find interesting
emails.body_text:
{{first_name}},

I ran a simple backtest using our sentiment signals on consumer discretionary names.

Methodology:
- Long when sentiment_score > 0.3 AND rising
- Short when sentiment_score < -0.3 AND falling
- 14-day holding period
- Universe: top 20 restaurant/retail stocks

Results (6 months):
- 72 signals generated
- 67% directional accuracy
- Sharpe: 1.8
- Max drawdown: 8.2%
- No survivorship bias (all signals logged in real-time)

I can share the full signal log with entry/exit prices if you want to replicate.

Let me know if this is worth exploring further.

Simon

---

emails.subject: Last ping - sample data available
emails.preview: Happy to share if timing is better later
emails.body_text:
{{first_name}},

Just a final note - I have a sample dataset ready if you ever want to test our sentiment data in your models.

Includes:
- 30 days of data
- 10,000 locations
- Full schema documentation
- Python code examples

No commitment needed - just reply "send it" and I'll share the link.

If not the right time, no worries. I'll check back in a few months.

Best,
Simon
